1=1
and to_days(now())-to_days(t.date) =1
and date_format(curdate(),'%y%m') = date_format(t.date,'%y%m')

select sum(ifnull(pv, 0)) as pv_count, sum(ifnull(uv, 0)) as uv_count, sum(ifnull(recharge_number, 0)) as recharge_number, sum(ifnull(recharge, 0)) as recharge_amount, sum(ifnull(new_user_num, 0)) as add_users from rpt_site_summary t
1=1
and t.site_id = #{p.siteId}
and date_format(t.date,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(t.date,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(t.date,'%Y%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.startTime},'%Y%m')
and date_format(t.date,'%Y%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.endTime},'%Y%m')
order by t.date asc
